siteMetadata.title: Eufemia - DNB Design System
siteMetadata.description: Eufemia Design System is the go to place for all who has to design, develop and make digital WEB applications for DNB.

frontmatter.title: Fragments
frontmatter.description: Fragments are small, low-level and reusable parts used inside other components.

frontmatter.title: UI Library
frontmatter.description: Buttons, dropdowns, input fields, components etc.

frontmatter.title: FormStatus (StatusMessage)
frontmatter.description: The FormStatus is a simple component meant for displaying the status of a form.

frontmatter.title: GlobalError (404)
frontmatter.description: The GlobalError is a simple component to integrate where a 404 or 500 message has to be shown.
